ACT","onSale":true,"applicableToAllUpcs":true},"policy":{"text":"Limited quantities, while supplies last. Intermediate markdowns may have been taken.\n\"Regular\" (REG.) and \"Original\" (ORIG.) prices are offering prices. Silver, Gold and Platinum Star Rewards members who do not pay with their Macy`s Credit Card on macys.com, including payment with a Macy`s Credit Card in a virtual wallet, will not earn bonus points on that purchase. Bonus points are not earned: on Finish Line, Macy`s Gift Cards, services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.), fees, or sales tax; at Macy`s Backstage; in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; or when redeeming Star Money, Macy`s Gift Cards, or Macy`s Money. Every time 1,000 points are accumulated, a $10 Star Money reward will be issued. Star Money rewards may be used to purchase merchandise at Macy`s but can`t be exchanged for cash or used: to purchase Macy`s Gift Cards; for services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.); in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; for any purchase that will be shipped outside the U.S.; or as payment on any credit account. To redeem a Star Money reward on orders of furniture and mattresses on macys.com, you must call Macy`s Customer Service. It may not be redeemed if you use a virtual wallet or self-checkout. Each Star Money reward is valid for 30 calendar days from issuance. Additional terms and conditions apply; see a Store Colleague or macys.com/starrewards for complete program Bonus points are not earned: on Finish Line, Macy`s Gift Cards, services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.), fees, or sales tax; at Macy`s Backstage; in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; or when redeeming Star Money, Macy`s Gift Cards, or Macy`s Money. Every time 1,000 points are accumulated, a $10 Star Money reward will be issued. Star Money rewards may be used to purchase merchandise at Macy`s but can`t be exchanged for cash or used: to purchase Macy`s Gift Cards; for services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.); in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; for any purchase that will be shipped outside the U.S.; or as payment on any credit account. To redeem a Star Money reward on orders of furniture and mattresses on macys.com, you must call Macy`s Customer Service. It may not be redeemed if you use a virtual wallet or self-checkout. Each Star Money reward is valid for 30 calendar days from issuance. Additional terms and conditions apply; see a Store Colleague or macys.com/starrewards for complete program Star Money rewards may be used to purchase merchandise at Macy`s but can`t be exchanged for cash or used: to purchase Macy`s Gift Cards; for services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.); in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; for any purchase that will be shipped outside the U.S.; or as payment on any credit account. To redeem a Star Money reward on orders of furniture and mattresses on macys.com, you must call Macy`s Customer Service. It may not be redeemed if you use a virtual wallet or self-checkout. Each Star Money reward is valid for 30 calendar days from issuance. Bonus points are not earned: on Finish Line, Macy`s Gift Cards, services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.), fees, or sales tax; at Macy`s Backstage; in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; or when redeeming Star Money, Macy`s Gift Cards, or Macy`s Money. Every time 1,000 points are accumulated, a $10 Star Money reward will be issued. Star Money rewards may be used to purchase merchandise at Macy`s but can`t be exchanged for cash or used: to purchase Macy`s Gift Cards; for services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.); in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; for any purchase that will be shipped outside the U.S.; or as payment on any credit account. To redeem a Star Money reward on orders of furniture and mattresses on macys.com, you must call Macy`s Customer Service. It may not be redeemed if you use a virtual wallet or self-checkout. Each Star Money reward is valid for 30 calendar days from issuance. Additional terms and conditions apply; see a Store Colleague or macys.com/starrewards for complete program details.","applicableToAllUpcs":true,"offer":"PROMO_TIERED_OFFER","promotionType":"Promotional Pricing"}]},"availability":{"active":true,"available":true}}]};
</script>
